data.name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Cosmetics: Riches of the Mirrored City
data.detailed_description:
Shadespire was once a city of wonder and magic, a mercantile metropolis rising from the unforgiving earth of the Realm of Death. Countless races dwelt within its walls, together creating artefacts of astonishing beauty and power. Now, they can be yours. Unlock the Riches of the Mirrored City in Warhammer Underworlds: Online now.

This bundle contains exciting new cosmetic items for TEN warbands in Warhammer Underworlds: Online, including warband skins, player titles, and deck portraits.

WARBAND SKINS

  • The Lions of Sigmar (for use with Steelheart’s Champions)
  • Brazen Butchers (for use with Magore’s Fiends)
  • Shadeglass Sentinels (for use with Sepulchral Guard)
  • The Stoneskulls (for use with Ironskull’s Boyz)
  • Clan Septik (for use with Spiteclaw’s Swarm)
  • The Lions of Sigmar (for use with The Farstriders)
  • The Regal Wraiths (for use with Thorns of the Briar Queen)
  • Augurs of Tzeentch (for use with Eyes of the Nine)
  • Vergald Lodge (for use with The Chosen Axes)
  • The Lions of Sigmar (for use with Stormsire’s Cursebreakers)

DECK PORTRAITS

  • Deck portrait 1 (for use with Eyes of the Nine)
  • Deck portrait 2 (for use with Steelheart’s Champions)
  • Deck portrait 3 (for use with Thorns of the Briar Queen)
  • Deck portrait 4 (for use with Stormsire’s Cursebreakers)
  • Deck portrait 5 (for use with The Farstriders)
  • Deck portrait 6 (for use with Magore’s Fiends)
  • Deck portrait 7 (for use with The Chosen Axes)
  • Deck portrait 8 (for use with Spiteclaw’s Swarm)
  • Deck portrait 9 (for use with Ironskull’s Boyz)
  • Deck portrait 10 (for use with Sepulchral Guard)

PLAYER TITLES

  • Warriors of Sigmar (for use with Steelheart’s Champions)
  • Blood Legion (for use with Magore’s Fiends)
  • Legion of Nagash (for use with Sepulchral Guard)
  • Waaagh! (for use with Ironskull’s Boyz)
  • Child of Pestilence (for use with Spiteclaw’s Swarm)
  • Rangers of Sigmar (for use with The Farstriders)
  • Phantasmal Horror (for use with Thorns of the Briar Queen)
  • Disciple of Tzeentch (for use with Eyes of the Nine)
  • Blazing Fury (for use with The Chosen Axes)
  • Sigmar's Tempest (for use with Stormsire’s Cursebreakers)

Please note: In order to use the skins, portraits and titles, you must first own the associated warband DLC. If you do not own the warband DLC at purchase, the items will be stored in your inventory and will unlock when an associated DLC warband purchase is made.

data.short_description: Shadespire was once a city of wonder and magic. Countless races dwelt within its walls, together creating artefacts of astonishing beauty and power. Now, they can be yours! Unlock the Riches of the Mirrored City in Warhammer Underworlds: Online now.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 @ 2.80 GHz / AMD FX-4350 @ 4.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
